title: 6.24 still on schedule for tomorrow?
body:
I guess I just haven't seen anything recent in the news board leading me to believe that we are still getting a patch tomorrow

Any news that I missed?

I know that is was scheduled for the 7th

http://leaguetales.com/

replies.body: yes it is cumming out tonight.
you dont want a source, he used the wrong coming
ive been wondering too, theres no patch notes
patch notes usually cumm out in the afternoon

Looks very likely.

A few regions will probably get 6.24 today (the 6th). For most it'll probably be the 7th.
This seems like a relatively legit source... Kappa

oh didnt see lol

also, inb4 ppl swarm meddler with questions about balance

How does Riot feel about Vlad right now?

Do you feel like Rylai's and his success are tightly knitted? Will you be keeping an eye on him after the Rylai's nerfs?
